script-module-step.description: Copy or move files from one directory to another.

parameter.description: If NOT checked, source files will be DELETED. Use with care!
When checked, the operation will include subfolders.
If checked, existing files in target folder will be overwritten.
Mark the step as disabled. This will skip the step and returns a OK status

status.description: Used when no file could be found in the source directory.

script-module-step.description: Delete files older than a certan age.

parameter.description: Mark the step as disabled. This will skip the step and returns a OK status
Number of days to keep old files

status.description: Used when no file could be found in the source directory.

script-module-step.description: Zip files or directories locally

parameters.description: Local folder where to find files, relative to IMPEX/
File pattern (Regular Expression)
Local folder where to store the generated archive, relative to IMPEX/
The name of the archive to generate
Ask the script to remove the files from the source folder when adding them to the archive.
Ask the script to remove the source folder after completion. Can be usefull if the archive is stored in another directory than the source files to avoid having empty folders.
Exit code in case no files were found.
Mark the step as disabled. This will skip the step and returns a OK status

status.description: In case exit status is OK and no files were found.

script-module-step.description: Zip files or directories locally

parameters.description: Local folder where to find files, relative to IMPEX/
File pattern (Regular Expression)
Local folder where to store the generated archive, relative to IMPEX/
If set to true, all archives that matches the given FilePattern will be removed after completion.
If set to true, the archive name will be appended to the TargetFolder parameter and the files in the archive will be uncompressed in there.
Exit code in case no files were found.
Mark the step as disabled. This will skip the step and returns a OK status

status.description: In case exit status is OK and no files were found.

script-module-step.description: Download files from an (S)FTP server

parameters.description: Private Key Alias to retrieve from BM keystore
File pattern (Regular Expression)
Remote folder on Server where to find files, relative to home directory
Local folder where to store files, relative to IMPEX/
When checked, the operation will include subfolders.
If set to true, remove each file after a successful download
Exit code in case no files were found.
Mark the step as disabled. This will skip the step and returns a OK status

status.description: In case exit status is OK and no files were found.

script-module-step.description: Upload files to an (S)FTP server

parameters.description: Private Key Alias to retrieve from BM keystore
File pattern (Regular Expression)
Local folder with files, relative to IMPEX/
Remote folder on Server, relative to home directory
If checked, We will take care of tree.
Local folder where to archive files, relative to IMPEX/
Exit code in case no files were found.
Mark the step as disabled. This will skip the step and returns a OK status

status.description: In case exit status is OK and no files were found.

parameters.description: The instance timezone time when the time slot starts
The instance timezone time when the time slot ends
Defines whether subsequent steps should be executed when within or not within the time slot.
Select which timezone to use for Start and end time (Site or Instance)

status.description: Used when subsequent steps should be skipped.

Filename of the generated files that will contains exported data
Query used to export orders. Leave empty to export all orders of the current site
Encryption algorithm to use for payment data. Can be 'RSA'.
The base64 public key to use for encryption. Please refer to RSA on how to generate RSA key pairs

Optional flag indicating whether the export status of the orders being exported will be set to 'Exported' or not. If true, all related OnOrder inventory transactions are also turned into final inventory transactions.
Overwrite the file if exists

script-module-step.description: Triggers an Error Status if no Orders are being created, placed or exported for a certain amount of time.

parameters.description: Maximum age of an order (in minutes) that fulfils the configured condition(s).
Optional: Time of day (hh:mm:ss, 24-hour-format) from when the checks should be executed (in Site's timezone).
Optional: Time of day (hh:mm:ss, 24-hour-format) until when the checks should be executed (in Site's timezone).
Check for Order Placement (NEW/OPEN status)
Check for Payment Status (PAID)
Check for Order Export Status (EXPORTED)

status.description: Used when job is facing a time that is outside of the configured window.
